title:
Phase mixing estimates for the nonlinear Hartree equation of infinite
  rank
abstract:
In this paper, we prove the phase mixing estimates for the density and its
derivatives associated with the nonlinear Hartree equation around certain
translation-invariant equilibria. Their decay rates are exactly the same as
those of free Hartree dynamics. Our method is based on pointwise decay
estimates of the Green function associated with the linearized operator in
Fourier space and a nonlinear iterative scheme. Another proof of short-range
scattering, established in [arXiv:1310.0604, arXiv:1607.07958,
arXiv:2308.15929], is also provided.
